behavior slice_the_chicken(chicken:item):
    body:
        achieve cut(chicken) # Achieve the goal of slicing the chicken

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken) and close_char(char, chicken)
        # Bind the chicken as the item to be sliced, and ensure it is close to the character
        slice_the_chicken(chicken) # Invoke the behavior to slice the chicken

def is_cutting_board_near(table:item):
    # Determine whether there is a cutting board near the table
    symbol has_cutting_board=exists cutting_board: item : is_cutting_board(cutting_board) and close(
cutting_board, table)
    return has_cutting_board

behavior put_on_table(o:item, table:item):
    body:
        achieve on(o, table)

behavior use_knife_to_cut(chicken:item, cutting_board:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(chicken)
        achieve cut(chicken)
        # Achieve slice the chicken using a cutting board

behavior retrieve_knife_from_kitchen(kitchen:item):
    body:
        bind table: item where:
            is_table(table) and is_kitchen_counter(table) and close(table, kitchen)
        # Select the table in the kitchen that is close to the kitchen
        assert is_cutting_board_near(table)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Select the chicken item

        bind kitchen: item where:
            is_dining_room(kitchen)
        # Select the kitchen

        retrieve_knife_from_kitchen(kitchen)

        achieve_once inhand(chicken)
        
        bind table: item where:
            is_table(table) and is_kitchen_counter(table)
        # Select the table in the kitchen for slicing
        
        if not is_cutting_board_near(table):
            retrieve_knife_from_kitchen(kitchen)
           
        bind cutting_board: item where:
            is_cutting_board(cutting_board) and close(cutting_board, table)
        # Select a cutting board close to the table

        put_on_table(chicken, cutting_board)
        use_knife_to_cut(chicken, cutting_board)
